column5: Hope your moving around better than when I dropped you off, never know we might be able to try casting and drop shotting instead of trolling by nex week
Hope everything went well and it all works good for ya Bubba!!!  Get well soon!!!
I hope everything goes well for you Buddy and I hope you have speedy recovery. Best wishes from your pal Dan
Hope everything went well with the surgury and your up and about sooner than later!  Cheers, 1leg
I hope you have a speedy recovery...mine took a bit longer but then I'm getting a little long in the tooth and don't bounce back as quick as I used to...
Good Luck Shawn, hope all goes well.  Joey
Get healed up soon Bubba. I know you want to get back to throwing big baits on the Ottawa.
Hope the surgery goes well Shawn and the recovery is quick.  Take Care and get back on the water soon.
Hope you get well soon Shawn, I'll make sure to pick a calm day on Simcoe.
Best wishes for a speedy recovery.
Wishing you a speedy recovery Shawn.  Stan
all the best shawn......know all too well bout back surgery.....    just take it easy.....  cheers
Hope the surgery goes well!  And a fast recovery!
Hey Shawn....nice timing on the surgery....the walleye season has yet to pick up.  I know you'll be on Quinte probably a week earlier than the Drs tell you to!!!  Good luck!
Shawn, I had my spine removed when I got married - no back problems here! Best wishes bud! -Brian
yykes!!!! I didn't know you were getting cut up?Well the fish will wait for ya!good luck with it.
